title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Warriors Co-Owner Peter Guber on Championship Culture, Sports vs. Movie Business
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Warriors Co-Owner Peter Guber on Championship Culture, Sports vs. Movie Business
description:
Warriors co-owner - and Academy Award nominated producer - Peter Guber and Colin discuss how owning a sports team is different than other investments (5:00), how he stays involved without being a “meddling owner” (7:00), how he effectively communicates with star athletes and actors (10:00), when he knew that Tom Cruise would be a box office star (19:00), the difference between appealing to movie and sports audiences (23:00), and what he learned from a meeting with Nelson Mandela (28:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
